title: Swansea make £9m bid for Ajax's Germany international Amin Younes
description: Swansea have made a £9m bid for Ajax winger Amin Younes, according to Sky in Italy.
content: Younes joined Ajax from Borussia Monchengladbach in 2015 and boasts an impressive tally of 12 goals and 19 assists from 65 appearances in the Eredivisie.The 24-year-old has not played for Ajax since November due to a knee problem but his future in Amsterdam has been the subject of speculation with his contract due to expire in the summer.Younes is a Germany international, with the last of his five international appearances coming in a 5-1 win over Azerbaijan in Kaiserslautern.Struggling Swansea are bottom of the Premier League and face a difficult task at home to Jurgen Klopp's Liverpool on Monday Night Football, live on Sky Sports Premier League.
